data.title: Corporate Services
data.meta_description: DJ Edinburgh provides DJ and comp√®re services to corporate clients in Edinburgh. If you need a DJ in Edinburgh, just give us a call.
data.text:
DJ Edinburgh is a small independent Edinburgh-based company providing Entertainment, MC and Audio Sound Hire throughout Scotland. DJ Edinburgh has entertained the corporate sector for over 30 years, independently and on behalf of a small number of select corporate entertainment agencies such as SpeakOut!, The Entertainers Agency and Reeltime Events as a Personality Host and Master DJ. Our concept is dynamic, simple, economical and professional with a corporate edge. The concept is as creative as it is pivotal. As both Facilitator and Host at your event during the day or evening presentations, and as a Master DJ with a fantastic disco - PA and lighting - dancing all night is assured. DJ Edinburgh will enable you, your colleagues and your guests to dance away into the small hours with memorable success.

Master of Ceremonies

Vis-a-vis your event hosting needs, we will learn your business and understand the purpose of your event for relevant input / preambles and introductions. Should your event be charity focused, background information or objectives/successes etc will be shared with your guests competently. In addition, our MC host will take an active role in tasks such as Auctioneering or Raffles. This is not an exhaustive list and all eventualities in Hosting and as MC can be championed.

Whether the intimacy of a small group event to a large corporate extravaganza, for training and or presentation purposes, for business and pleasure, in events and entertainment, DJ Edinburgh will enable your ideas, your thoughts and aspirations in corporate entertainment to become realised.

Corporate events are important whatever the celebratory occasion. 100% of the time, they all have the same objective of fun, excitement and top drawer entertainment for everyone invited. We will ensure your event will be HUGE memorably. Our sound and light equipment is excellent at all events and DJ Edinburgh's DJ will deliver your music memories clearly, professionally and humorously.

Additionally for staff themed office parties such as Halloween, Valentines and Christmas, DJ Edinburgh will enable your successful event to become a memorable one.

If you require a function band, alternative entertainers, Scottish Country dancing & Ceilidh band, pipers or Personality Speakers - and anything else in entertainment, please tell us.

Contact us now to make your next event a great success, or book James Henderson directly with SpeakOut!.
